about.title: More than a game
about.sup_description: Our original transformational game helps expand imagination and change thinking in a game format.
about.description: This is a tool for finding answers to your questions. And it doesn’t matter what area of ​​life they lie in - personal development or relationships, creativity or starting a business, career or money, planning or developing a new idea, searching for meaning or simply learning to accept the world as it is.

options.1: analyze the current state of affairs;

requests.title: The way to yourself
requests.description_1: A game {{brandName}} helps you achieve your goals by helping you see the fears and beliefs that limit you.
requests.description_2: Providing an opportunity through the gameplay to go beyond the usual and find innovative solutions, new ideas and opportunities.
requests.btn: I want to go to the game

formats.title:
Topics with which
people come to the game

topics.title: GAME REQUESTS
topics.description: Popular queries people come to the game with:

options.1:
- I want to unlock my potential:
How can I develop my strengths?
options.2:
- I want to achieve success:
In what direction should you move to successfully move forward in life?
options.3:
- I want to increase my income:
How can you improve your financial situation?
options.4:
- I want to improve my relationship:
How to create harmony in the family or find a suitable partner?
options.5:
- I want joy and brightness in life:
What can bring joy and how to find it?
options.6:
- I want to achieve what I want:
How to manifest yourself into the world to achieve your goals?
options.7:
- I want to find my calling:
How do you determine what you should do to get satisfaction?
options.8:
- I want to make the right decisions:
How to develop strategies to achieve the desired result?

responses.title: What will you get as a result of completing the game?
responses.description: You will be immersed in the exciting world of the UPGRADE game, where every step activates your thoughts, overturns your usual ideas and opens up new horizons in the perception and implementation of possibilities.

package_1.title: Individual game
package_1.description: You receive a deep impact that promotes more effective growth, awareness of change, taking into account your goals and aspirations.

package_2.title: Group game
package_2.description: You not only individually rethink your views, but also interact with other players, enriching each other's experiences.

manager_1.name: Elena Burdey

manager_2.name: Anna Grozina
manager_2.subject: Coach, business trainer, entrepreneur
manager_2.description: International level Professional Coach, Business Coach, Crisis coach, International College of Business Trainers
